articles.title: Emma Raducanu snubbed with 'best of the young group' Coco Gauff 'doing everything right' - Express
articles.description: EMMA RADUCANU was snubbed for Coco Gauff after the American lost the French Open final to Iga Swiatek.
articles.content: Emma Raducanu has been told that Coco Gauff is the “leader” of her generation in women’s tennis after the 18-year-old’s run to the French Open final. The American lost her maiden Grand Slam final to … [+2205 chars]
